# HTTPCookie.AcceptPolicy.always

**Case**

Accept all cookies.

## Declaration

```swift
case always
```

## Discussion

This is the default cookie accept policy.

## Policies

- **HTTPCookie.AcceptPolicy.never**: Reject all cookies.
- **HTTPCookie.AcceptPolicy.onlyFromMainDocumentDomain**: Accept cookies only from the main document domain.

items.description: Accept cookies only from the main document domain.
items.name: HTTPCookie.AcceptPolicy.onlyFromMainDocumentDomain
